messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] growing up (was parental crisis)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Carol: That is pretty amazing! What a coincidence. We must have both been experiencing the birthday boy is growing up too fast blues that day! What time
messages.messageBody:
> Date: Fri, 14 Apr 2000 15:51:46 EDT
> From: burkfamily@...
>Subject: Re: growing up (was Parental Crisis)

Carol wrote:


>Just saw this-I'm late catching up with mail, again! Just had to chime in
>that I also had a son that turned 7 on April 12th! Cool-we had babies on the
>same day seven years ago!


Carol:

That is pretty amazing! What a coincidence. We must have both been
experiencing the "birthday boy is growing up too fast" blues that day! What
time was he born? Mine was born at 9:30 PM (EST). I would love to know if
they have any common interests or personality traits. Drop me a line if you
can. Maybe they could send each other a postcard (or an email card). Oh,
and Happy Birthday to him too!

Olivia
